http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:507061
GoPro Frame (Hero 3 / 4) & Bacpac by MatteoMeraldi is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Non-Commercial license.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

# Summary

A simple and strong frame for GoPro hero 3 / 3+ / 4  
with holes for microSD, charge, shutter and wifi/HiLight button  

https://www.matteomeraldi.com/  

if you find my design usefull, please leave a tip!
